Function process_string(s) Result(output)
  character(len=*), intent(in)::s
  character(len=:), allocatable::output

  character(len= len_trim(s)) :: temp  ! Large enough array
  integer :: k
  allocate(character(len= len_trim(s)) :: temp) k = 1
  do i = 1, len_trim(s)
    character(len=1) :: c = s(i:i)
    if (ichar(c) >= 97 .and. ichar(c) < = 122 ) then  ! lowercase
       temp(k:k) = c
       k = k+1
    else if ( ichar(c)>=65 .and. ichar(c)<=90 ) then
       temp(k:k) = char(ichar(c)+32)
       k= k+1
    end if
  end do
  if (k ==1 ) then
     output = ''
  else
     output = temp(1: k-1 )
  end if
  deallocate(temp)
children.label: code_analysis

End Function process_string

Function process_string(s) Result(output)
  character(len=*), intent(in)::s
  character(len=:), allocatable::output

  character(len= len_trim(s)) :: temp  ! Large enough array
  integer :: k
  allocate(character(len= len_trim(s)) :: temp)

  k = 1
  do i = 1, len_trim(s)
    character(len=1) :: c = s(i:i)
    if (ichar(c) >= 97 .and. ichar(c) <= 122 ) then  ! lowercase
       temp(k:k) = c
       k = k+1
    else if ( ichar(c)>=65 .and. ichar(c)<=90 ) then
       temp(k:k) = char(ichar(c)+32)
       k= k+1
    end if
  end do
  if (k ==1 ) then
     output = ''
  else
     output = temp(1: k-1 )
  end if
  deallocate(temp)
End Function process_string

    function process_string(input_str) result(output)
        character(len=*), intent(in) :: input_str
        character(len=:), allocatable :: output
        integer :: i, k
        integer :: len_in = len(trim(input_str))
        character(len=len_in) :: temp
        
        k = 1
        do i = 1, len_in
            character(len=1)  :: c = input_str(i:i)
            ! Check if the character is a letter
            if ( ichar(c) >= 65 .and. ichar(c) <= 122 ) then

                    temp(k:k) = c
                else
                    temp(k:k) = achar(ichar(c) + 32)
                end if                
                k = k + 1
            end if
        end do
        if (k > 1) then
            output = temp(1:k-1)
        else
            output = ""
        end if
    end function process_string

    logical function is_in_list(test_str)
        character(len=*), intent(in) :: test_str
        logical :: found = .false.
        integer :: j
        do j = 1, size(permutations)
            if ( test_str == permutations(j) ) then
                found = .true.
                exit
            end if
        end do
        is_in_list = found
    end function is_in_list

End Program Codeforces_B
